review: Stick works great but have some problem with the remote freezing.
author: Roland Chin

review: Bought two of these and one is fine yet other one already doesnt work at all and its very very sad!!!  Not sure what issue is, been trying to troubleshoot it.  The remote seems to be running constantly which means batteries galore unless you have rechargeable ones which we dont at the moment.  Otherwise I would be Rokus biggest fan!
author: Aimee

review: Loved it. ..but totally quit within 45 days!
author: Jodi Peters

review: Not as stable as the module type - I have to take it out and reboot from time to time as it gets very hot.  But takes up much less room - I just wish it didn't stick out from the HDMI socket and have the wire trailing down, not as neat as I'd like.
author: JS NY

review: After several attempts product was returned as we could not get it to work, to connect to Wi Fi.  Very disappointing.
author: Reviewer
